Package de.lases.control.backing

Class WelcomeBacking

java.lang.Object
de.lases.control.backing.WelcomeBacking
@Named @RequestScoped public class WelcomeBacking extends Object
Backing bean for the welcome page.

      public WelcomeBacking()

  • Method Details

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Load the text displayed on the welcome page from the system settigns and set up the user dto for login.

    • login

      public String login()
      Check the entered login data and either show an error message or go to the homepage (and log the user in).
      Returns:
      Go to the homepage on success and nowhere on failure.

    • goToRegister

      public String goToRegister()
      Go to the register page.
      Returns:
      Go to the register page.

    • getLoginInput

      public User getLoginInput()

    • setLoginInput

      public void setLoginInput​(User loginInput)
      Set the user dto that holds the entered login information.
      Parameters:
      loginInput - The dto holding the entered login information.

    • getSystemSettings

      public SystemSettings getSystemSettings()
      Get the system setting dto, which especially holds the headline and the message for the welcome page.
      Returns:
      The system settings dto.

    • getSessionInformation

      public SessionInformation getSessionInformation()
      Get session information.
      Returns:
      The session information.
